module.name: StaticContentSample
module.param: This report allows you to profile and score user sessions. A user experience score of 1 (lowest) to 5 (highest) is assigned to the various components monitored as part of a user's session. To get started, enter a username, server hostname, select a time range and click Submit.

module.name: SubmitButton
module.module:
`xenapp_index` sourcetype=xenapp:*:session $user$ | fields ServerName | dedup ServerName
True True host_setting
ServerName ServerName
True
host_setting
stringreplace
False $target$
`xenapp_index` `xa_ica` $user$ host=$host$ | eval SessionBandwidth=InputSessionBandwidth+OutputSessionBandwidth | search SessionBandwidth>=0 | timechart span=1m max(SessionBandwidth) as MaxSessionBandwidth min(SessionBandwidth) as MinSessionBandwidth median(SessionBandwidth) as "AvgSessionBandwidth" Max(LatencySessionAverage) as "LatencySessionAverage" | eval AvgSessionBandwidth = round(AvgSessionBandwidth,2) | where MaxSessionBandwidth>=0 | sort - _time
| timechart span=1m avg(AvgSessionBandwidth) as Bandwidth
line none connect Time none
100%
flashtimeline
flashtimeline Session Counters <<<<<<< HEAD
=======
>>>>>>> User Experience updates
| timechart span=1m Max(LatencySessionAverage) as Latency
line connect none Time bottom
100%
flashtimeline
| stats avg(AvgSessionBandwidth) as SessionBandwidth | eval SessionBandwidth = round(SessionBandwidth,2) | `usrexp_icabw` | eval usrexp="usrexp"+usrexp
SessionBandwidth usrexp count ICA Session Bandwidth: kbs
| stats median(LatencySessionAverage) as LatencySessionAverage | eval LatencySessionAverage = round(LatencySessionAverage,2) | `usrexp_icalatency` | eval usrexp="usrexp"+usrexp

`perfmon_cpu` [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ host=$host$ | stats first(ServerName) as host by UserName | head 1 | fields + host] | bin _time span=1m | stats last(Value) as Value by _time host >>>>>>> User Experience updates
| timechart span=1m max(Value) as "Max % CPU" avg(Value) as "Avg % CPU" min(Value) as "Min % CPU"
line connect Time none bottom % 0 100

| eval Value=Value/1024/1024 | timechart span=1m max(Value) as MaxMBFree avg(Value) as AvgMBFree min(Value) as MinMBFree | eval MaxMBFree= round(MaxMBFree,2) | eval AvgMBFree= round(AvgMBFree,2) | eval MinMBFree= round(MinMBFree,2)

`win_index` Type=Error sourcetype="WinEventLog:*" [search `xenapp_index` `xa_sessions_sourcetype` $user$ $host$ | stats latest(ServerName) as host earliest(ServerName) as junk_ServerName by UserName | `remove_junk` | head 1 | fields + host] | stats values(SourceName) as "Source(s)" values(Message) as "Message(s)" by Type host | head 10 | sort - count | rename host as Host =======

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: eventtype=servervirt:performance:*:host:processor OR eventtype=servervirt:performance:*:host:memory [search eventtype=servervirt:vm vm_name=$host$ | fields vm_host | head 1 | rename vm_host AS hyp_hostname] | fields object counter instance Value hyp_hostname

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="% Processor Time" instance="_Total" | timechart max(Value) as "Max % CPU"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="% Processor Time" instance="_Total" | stats max(Value) as Value | eval Value=round(Value,2) | `usrexp_cpu` | eval usrexp="usrexp"+usrexp

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="Available Bytes" | eval MB=`toMB(Value)` | timechart max(MB) as "Available Megabytes"

module.name: HiddenPostProcess
module.param: | search counter="Available Bytes" | stats median(Value) as Value | eval Value=round(Value,2) | `usrexp_mem` | eval usrexp="usrexp"+usrexp | eval mem=`formatBytes(Value)`

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: index=netapp_perf [search eventtype=servervir:vdisk vm_name=$host$ | fields vdisk_share_vol | rename vdisk_share_vol AS instance | head 1] | timechart avg(read_ops) AS "Read ops" avg(write_ops) AS "Write ops" by instance

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: eventtype=citrix_ns [search `xenapp_index` sourcetype=xenapp:*:server ServerName=$host$ | fields IPAddresses | rename IPAddresses AS src_ip | head 1 ] | timechart avg(total_bytes_recv) AS "Avg Bytes Received" avg(total_bytes_send) AS "Avg Bytes Sent"
